title: Sam Edelman's incredible shoes are on sale at Nordstrom Rack
text:
Sam Edelman's incredible shoes are on sale at Nordstrom Rack

Get the best footwear of the season at incredible prices. (Photo: Nordstrom Rack)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

The perfect fall outfit is not complete without a good pair of boots. If you're trying to add a few more pairs into your rotation without going broke, look no further because we've found the sale you need. Right now, Nordstrom Rack is offering up to 60% off Sam Edelman boots and booties (and shoes too!). These prices are insanely low, making this sale a shoe lover's dream.

Sam Edelman is known for quality, long-lasting shoes, but they typically comes with a high price tag. Thankfully this sale makes it possible to get a pair (or two, or three) without breaking the bank. The popular Caprice Knee-High Boots are $140 (save $85 and the Tinsley Ankle Rain Boots are just $44 (save $15), which are ideal for staying stylish in the rain. Plus, you can never go wrong with something like these Patrick Suede Booties, which are $50 off, bring the price down to just $90.

But this sale goes beyond boots and booties. If you want to save on your footwear for spring and summer, you can snag some gorgeous strappy heels, open-toed mules, and leopard-printed loafers, all at enticing discount prices. Seriously, there are so many ways to save that you can finalize your shoe closet in one sale if you want.

Warning: This sale ends on Thursday, October 24, so you don't have too much time to browse. If you see something you like, I wouldn't hesitate. Things are already selling out size by size and style by style, so there may be slim pickings if you wait until the end.

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for the latest deals, reviews, and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
